Description:
Detects buffer overflow attempts in Unix system log files

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Buffer Overflow Attempts
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%attempt to execute code on stack by%' or log like '%ftp login from .* 0bin0sh%' or log like '%rpc.statd[\d+]: gethostbyname error for%' or log like '%aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa%')
